bottom_layer.rule: Force this block at y==0 across the entire world regardless of terrain height.
bottom_layer.notes: Nullblock is now the canonical enum in-game. Keep an alias/compat mapping for Corestone in loader if older worlds exist.

unbreakable_survival_requirement.rule: Nullblock must not be breakable in Survival mode; only allow in Creative/Dev if supported.
unbreakable_survival_requirement.implementation: Enforce in block-break logic + explosion immunity; do not rely on client-only checks.
